title: Yasuo Dash
body:
When i use the E of Yasuo ( The dash spell) it doesn't show me the cooldown on enemy or minion that shows the 10 seconds left for using again the dash in that specifically minion or enemy.
I dont't know if i disable something or i have to update my effect ( i have very low) , but the effect doesn't shows me. Help!
Thanks! ;D

replies.body:
Hmmmmm that could be related to your config settings possibly or maybe game files that aren't working properly. Try running a quick repair through the client options, and if that doesn't help go ahead and try a config reset with the steps below! Let me know if neither of these work though!

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
